forms.description: Nicknamed "the bully of the sea," Sharpedo is widely feared. Its cruel fangs grow back immediately if they snap off. Just one of these Pokémon can thoroughly tear apart a supertanker.
forms.name: Mega Sharpedo

name: Sharpedo

description: Plusle always acts as a cheerleader for its partners. Whenever a teammate puts out a good effort in battle, this Pokémon shorts out its body to create the crackling noises of sparks to show its joy.
name: Plusle

description: Wailord is the largest of all identified Pokémon up to now. This giant Pokémon swims languorously in the vast open sea, eating massive amounts of food at once with its enormous mouth.
name: Wailord

description: When Swalot spots prey, it spurts out a hideously toxic fluid from its pores and sprays the target. Once the prey has weakened, this Pokémon gulps it down whole with its cavernous mouth.
name: Swalot

description: Numel is extremely dull witted - it doesn't notice being hit. However, it can't stand hunger for even a second. This Pokémon's body is a seething cauldron of boiling magma.
name: Numel

description: Camerupt has a volcano inside its body. Magma of 18,000 degrees Fahrenheit courses through its body. Occasionally, the humps on this Pokémon's back erupt, spewing the superheated magma.

forms.description: Camerupt has a volcano inside its body. Magma of 18,000 degrees Fahrenheit courses through its body. Occasionally, the humps on this Pokémon's back erupt, spewing the superheated magma.
forms.name: Mega Camerupt

name: Camerupt

description: Torkoal digs through mountains in search of coal. If it finds some, it fills hollow spaces on its shell with the coal and burns it. If it is attacked, this Pokémon spouts thick black smoke to beat a retreat.
name: Torkoal

description: Grumpig uses the black pearls on its body to amplify its psychic power waves for gaining total control over its foe. When this Pokémon uses its special power, its snorting breath grows labored.
name: Grumpig

description: All the Spinda that exist in the world are said to have utterly unique spot patterns. The shaky, tottering steps of this Pokémon give it the appearance of dancing.
name: Spinda

description: Trapinch's nest is a sloped, bowl-like pit dug in sand. This Pokémon patiently waits for prey to tumble down the pit. Its giant jaws have enough strength to crush even boulders.
name: Trapinch

description: To make prey faint, Vibrava generates ultrasonic waves by vigorously making its two wings vibrate. This Pokémon's ultrasonic waves are so powerful, they can bring on headaches in people.
name: Vibrava

description: Flygon is nicknamed "the elemental spirit of the desert." Because its flapping wings whip up a cloud of sand, this Pokémon is always enveloped in a sandstorm while flying.
name: Flygon

description: Cacnea lives in arid locations such as deserts. It releases a strong aroma from its flower to attract prey. When prey comes near, this Pokémon shoots sharp thorns from its body to bring the victim down.
name: Cacnea

description: During the daytime, Cacturne remains unmoving so that it does not lose any moisture to the harsh desert sun. This Pokémon becomes active at night when the temperature drops.
name: Cacturne

description: Spoink bounces around on its tail. The shock of its bouncing makes its heart pump. As a result, this Pokémon cannot afford to stop bouncing - if it stops, its heart will stop.
name: Spoink

description: Swablu has light and fluffy wings that are like cottony clouds. This Pokémon is not frightened of people. It lands on the heads of people and sits there like a cotton-fluff hat.
name: Swablu

description: Altaria dances and wheels through the sky among billowing, cotton-like clouds. By singing melodies in its crystal-clear voice, this Pokémon makes its listeners experience dreamy wonderment.

forms.description: Altaria dances and wheels through the sky among billowing, cotton-like clouds. By singing melodies in its crystal-clear voice, this Pokémon makes its listeners experience dreamy wonderment.
forms.name: Mega Altaria

name: Altaria

description: Memories of battling its archrival Seviper are etched into every cell of Zangoose's body. This Pokémon adroitly dodges attacks with incredible agility.
name: Zangoose

description: Seviper shares a generations-long feud with Zangoose. The scars on its body are evidence of vicious battles. This Pokémon attacks using its sword-edged tail.
name: Seviper

description: Lunatone was discovered at a location where a meteoroid fell. As a result, some people theorize that this Pokémon came from space. However, no one has been able to prove this theory so far.
name: Lunatone

description: Solrock is a new species of Pokémon that is said to have fallen from space. It floats in air and moves silently. In battle, this Pokémon releases intensely bright light.
name: Solrock

description: Barboach's sensitive whiskers serve as a superb radar system. This Pokémon hides in mud, leaving only its two whiskers exposed while it waits for prey to come along.
name: Barboach

description: Whiscash is extremely territorial. Just one of these Pokémon will claim a large pond as its exclusive territory. If a foe approaches it, it thrashes about and triggers a massive earthquake.
name: Whiscash

description: Corphish were originally foreign Pokémon that were imported as pets. They eventually turned up in the wild. This Pokémon is very hardy and has greatly increased its population.
name: Corphish

description: Crawdaunt has an extremely violent nature that compels it to challenge other living things to battle. Other life-forms refuse to live in ponds inhabited by this Pokémon, making them desolate places.
name: Crawdaunt

description: Baltoy moves while spinning around on its one foot. Primitive wall paintings depicting this Pokémon living among people were discovered in some ancient ruins.
name: Baltoy

description: Claydol are said to be dolls of mud made by primitive humans and brought to life by exposure to a mysterious ray. This Pokémon moves about while levitating.
name: Claydol

description: Cradily roams around the ocean floor in search of food. This Pokémon freely extends its tree trunk-like neck and captures unwary prey using its eight tentacles.
name: Cradily

description: Lileep became extinct approximately a hundred million years ago. This ancient Pokémon attaches itself to a rock on the seafloor and catches approaching prey using tentacles shaped like flower petals.
name: Lileep

description: Anorith was regenerated from a prehistoric fossil. This primitive Pokémon once lived in warm seas. It grips its prey firmly between its two large claws.
name: Anorith

description: Feebas's fins are ragged and tattered from the start of its life. Because of its shoddy appearance, this Pokémon is largely ignored. It is capable of living in both the sea and in rivers.
name: Feebas

description: Armaldo's tough armor makes all attacks bounce off. This Pokémon's two enormous claws can be freely extended or contracted. They have the power to punch right through a steel slab.
name: Armaldo

description: Milotic is said to be the most beautiful of all the Pokémon. It has the power to becalm such emotions as anger and hostility to quell bitter feuding.
name: Milotic

description: Kecleon is capable of changing its body colors at will to blend in with its surroundings. There is one exception - this Pokémon can't change the zigzag pattern on its belly.
name: Kecleon

description: Shuppet is attracted by feelings of jealousy and vindictiveness. If someone develops strong feelings of vengeance, this Pokémon will appear in a swarm and line up beneath the eaves of that person's home.
name: Shuppet

description: Castform's appearance changes with the weather. This Pokémon gained the ability to use the vast power of nature to protect its tiny body.

forms.description: Castform's appearance changes with the weather. This Pokémon gained the ability to use the vast power of nature to protect its tiny body.
forms.name: Mega Castform

forms.description: Castform's appearance changes with the weather. This Pokémon gained the ability to use the vast power of nature to protect its tiny body.
forms.name: Mega Castform

forms.description: Castform's appearance changes with the weather. This Pokémon gained the ability to use the vast power of nature to protect its tiny body.
forms.name: Mega Castform

name: Castform

description: Banette generates energy for laying strong curses by sticking pins into its own body. This Pokémon was originally a pitiful plush doll that was thrown away.

forms.description: Banette generates energy for laying strong curses by sticking pins into its own body. This Pokémon was originally a pitiful plush doll that was thrown away.
forms.name: Mega Banette

name: Banette

description: Duskull can pass through any wall no matter how thick it may be. Once this Pokémon chooses a target, it will doggedly pursue the intended victim until the break of dawn.
name: Duskull

description: Dusclops's body is completely hollow - there is nothing at all inside. It is said that its body is like a black hole. This Pokémon will absorb anything into its body, but nothing will ever come back out.
name: Dusclops

description: Chimecho makes its cries echo inside its hollow body. When this Pokémon becomes enraged, its cries result in ultrasonic waves that have the power to knock foes flying.
name: Chimecho

description: Every time Absol appears before people, it is followed by a disaster such as an earthquake or a tidal wave. As a result, it came to be known as the disaster Pokémon.

forms.description: Every time Absol appears before people, it is followed by a disaster such as an earthquake or a tidal wave. As a result, it came to be known as the disaster Pokémon.
forms.name: Mega Absol

name: Absol

description: The bunches of fruit around Tropius's neck are very popular with children. This Pokémon loves fruit, and eats it continuously. Apparently, its love for fruit resulted in its own outgrowth of fruit.
name: Tropius

description: Wynaut can always be seen with a big, happy smile on its face. Look at its tail to determine if it is angry. When angered, this Pokémon will be slapping the ground with its tail.
name: Wynaut

description: Snorunt live in regions with heavy snowfall. In seasons without snow, such as spring and summer, this Pokémon steals away to live quietly among stalactites and stalagmites deep in caverns.
name: Snorunt

description: Glalie has a body made of rock, which it hardens with an armor of ice. This Pokémon has the ability to freeze moisture in the atmosphere into any shape it desires.

forms.description: Glalie has a body made of rock, which it hardens with an armor of ice. This Pokémon has the ability to freeze moisture in the atmosphere into any shape it desires.
forms.name: Mega Glalie

name: Glalie

description: Spheal is much faster rolling than walking to get around. When groups of this Pokémon eat, they all clap at once to show their pleasure. Because of this, their mealtimes are noisy.
name: Spheal

description: Sealeo has the habit of always juggling on the tip of its nose anything it sees for the first time. This Pokémon occasionally entertains itself by balancing and rolling a Spheal on its nose.
name: Sealeo

description: Walrein's two massively developed tusks can totally shatter blocks of ice weighing 10 tons with one blow. This Pokémon's thick coat of blubber insulates it from subzero temperatures.
name: Walrein

description: Clamperl's sturdy shell is not only good for protection - it is also used for clamping and catching prey. A fully grown Clamperl's shell will be scored with nicks and scratches all over.
name: Clamperl

description: Gorebyss lives in the southern seas at extreme depths. Its body is built to withstand the enormous pressure of water at incredible depths. Because of this, this Pokémon's body is unharmed by ordinary attacks.
name: Gorebyss

description: Relicanth is a Pokémon species that existed for a hundred million years without ever changing its form. This ancient Pokémon feeds on microscopic organisms with its toothless mouth.
name: Relicanth

description: Bagon has a dream of one day soaring in the sky. In doomed efforts to fly, this Pokémon hurls itself off cliffs. As a result of its dives, its head has grown tough and as hard as tempered steel.
name: Bagon

description: Salamence came about as a result of a strong, long-held dream of growing wings. It is said that this powerful desire triggered a sudden mutation in this Pokémon's cells, causing it to sprout its magnificent wings.

forms.description: Salamence came about as a result of a strong, long-held dream of growing wings. It is said that this powerful desire triggered a sudden mutation in this Pokémon's cells, causing it to sprout its magnificent wings.
forms.name: Mega Salamence

name: Salamence

description: Huntail's presence went unnoticed by people for a long time because it lives at extreme depths in the sea. This Pokémon's eyes can see clearly even in the murky dark depths of the ocean.
name: Huntail

description: Inside Shelgon's armor-like shell, cells are in the midst of transformation to create an entirely new body. This Pokémon's shell is extremely heavy, making its movements sluggish.
name: Shelgon

description: When two Beldum fuse together, Metang is formed. The brains of the Beldum are joined by a magnetic nervous system. By linking its brains magnetically, this Pokémon generates strong psychokinetic power.
name: Metang

description: Instead of blood, a powerful magnetic force courses throughout Beldum's body. This Pokémon communicates with others by sending controlled pulses of magnetism.
name: Beldum

description: Metagross has four brains in total. Combined, the four brains can breeze through difficult calculations faster than a supercomputer. This Pokémon can float in the air by tucking in its four legs.
name: Metagross

description: Luvdisc live in shallow seas in the tropics. This heart-shaped Pokémon earned its name by swimming after loving couples it spotted in the ocean's waves.
name: Luvdisc

description: Metagross has four brains in total. Combined, the four brains can breeze through difficult calculations faster than a supercomputer. This Pokémon can float in the air by tucking in its four legs.

forms.description: Regirock was sealed away by people long ago. If this Pokémon's body is damaged in battle, it is said to seek out suitable rocks on its own to repair itself.
forms.name: Mega Regirock

name: Regirock

description: Regice's body was made during an ice age. The deep-frozen body can't be melted, even by fire. This Pokémon controls frigid air of -328 degrees Fahrenheit.
name: Regice

description: Latias is highly sensitive to the emotions of people. If it senses any hostility, this Pokémon ruffles the feathers all over its body and cries shrilly to intimidate the foe.

forms.description: Latias is highly sensitive to the emotions of people. If it senses any hostility, this Pokémon ruffles the feathers all over its body and cries shrilly to intimidate the foe.
forms.name: Mega Latias

name: Latias

description: Latios has the ability to make others see an image of what it has seen or imagines in its head. This Pokémon is intelligent and understands human speech.

forms.description: Latios has the ability to make others see an image of what it has seen or imagines in its head. This Pokémon is intelligent and understands human speech.
forms.name: Mega Latios

name: Latios

description: Through Primal Reversion and with nature's full power, it will take back its true form. It can summon storms that cause the sea levels to rise.

forms.description: Through Primal Reversion and with nature's full power, it will take back its true form. It can summon storms that cause the sea levels to rise.
forms.name: Mega Kyogre

name: Kyogre

description: Registeel has a body that is harder than any kind of metal. Its body is apparently hollow. No one has any idea what this Pokémon eats.
name: Registeel

description: A legend states that Jirachi will make true any wish that is written on notes attached to its head when it awakens. If this Pokémon senses danger, it will fight without awakening.
name: Jirachi

description: Rayquaza is said to have lived for hundreds of millions of years. Legends remain of how it put to rest the clash between Kyogre and Groudon.

forms.description: Rayquaza is said to have lived for hundreds of millions of years. Legends remain of how it put to rest the clash between Kyogre and Groudon.
forms.name: Mega Rayquaza

name: Rayquaza

description: Groudon is said to be the personification of the land itself. Legends tell of its many clashes against Kyogre, as each sought to gain the power of nature.

forms.description: Groudon is said to be the personification of the land itself. Legends tell of its many clashes against Kyogre, as each sought to gain the power of nature.
forms.name: Mega Groudon

name: Groudon

description: Photosynthesis occurs across its body under the sun. The shell on its back is actually hardened soil.
name: Turtwig

description: It lives along water in forests. In the daytime, it leaves the forest to sunbathe its treed shell.
name: Grotle

description: The DNA of a space virus underwent a sudden mutation upon exposure to a laser beam and resulted in Deoxys. The crystalline organ on this Pokémon's chest appears to be its brain.

forms.description: The DNA of a space virus underwent a sudden mutation upon exposure to a laser beam and resulted in Deoxys. The crystalline organ on this Pokémon's chest appears to be its brain.
forms.name: Mega Deoxys

forms.description: The DNA of a space virus underwent a sudden mutation upon exposure to a laser beam and resulted in Deoxys. The crystalline organ on this Pokémon's chest appears to be its brain.
forms.name: Mega Deoxys

forms.description: The DNA of a space virus underwent a sudden mutation upon exposure to a laser beam and resulted in Deoxys. The crystalline organ on this Pokémon's chest appears to be its brain.
forms.name: Mega Deoxys

name: Deoxys

description: Ancient people imagined that beneath the ground, a gigantic Torterra dwelled.
name: Torterra

description: Its fiery rear end is fueled by gas made in its belly. Even rain can't extinguish the fire.
name: Chimchar

description: It doesn't like to be taken care of. It's difficult to bond with since it won't listen to its Trainer.
name: Piplup

description: Its crown of fire is indicative of its fiery nature. It is beaten by none in terms of quickness.
name: Infernape

description: It lives alone, away from others. Apparently, every one of them believes it is the most important.
name: Prinplup

description: It skillfully controls the intensity of the fire on its tail to keep its foes at an ideal distance.
name: Monferno

description: It swims as fast as a jet boat. The edges of its wings are sharp and can slice apart drifting ice.
name: Empoleon

description: They flock in great numbers. Though small, they flap their wings with great power.
name: Starly

description: They maintain huge flocks, although fierce scuffles break out between various flocks.
name: Staravia

description: The muscles in its wings and legs are strong. It can easily fly while gripping a small Pokémon.
name: Staraptor

description: With nerves of steel, nothing can perturb it. It is more agile and active than it appears.
name: Bidoof

description: It busily makes its nest with stacks of branches and roots it has cut up with its sharp incisors.
name: Bibarel

description: It chats with others using the sounds of its colliding antennae. These sounds are fall hallmarks.
name: Kricketot

description: It crosses its knifelike arms in front of its chest when it cries. It can compose melodies ad lib.
name: Kricketune

description: The extension and contraction of its muscles generates electricity. It glows when in trouble.
name: Shinx

description: Its claws loose electricity with enough amperage to cause fainting. They live in small groups.
name: Luxio

description: When its eyes gleam gold, it can spot hiding prey - even those taking shelter behind a wall.
name: Luxray

description: Luring prey with a sweet scent, it uses poison whips on its arms to poison, bind, and finish off the prey.
name: Roserade

description: When it feels the sun's warm touch, it opens its bud to release pollen. It lives alongside clear pools.
name: Budew

description: It was resurrected from an iron ball-like fossil. It downs prey with its headbutts.
name: Cranidos

description: Its skull withstands impacts of any magnitude. As a result, its brain never gets the chance to grow.
name: Rampardos

description: It habitually polishes its face by rubbing it against tree trunks. It is weak to attacks from behind.
name: Shieldon

description: When they lined up side by side, no foe could break through. They shielded their young in that way.
name: Bastiodon

description: To shelter itself from cold, wintry winds, it covers itself with a cloak made of twigs and leaves.

forms.description: To shelter itself from cold, wintry winds, it covers itself with a cloak made of twigs and leaves.
forms.name: Mega Burmy

forms.description: To shelter itself from cold, wintry winds, it covers itself with a cloak made of twigs and leaves.
forms.name: Mega Burmy

name: Burmy

description: Its appearance changes depending on where it evolved. The materials on hand become a part of its body.

forms.description: Its appearance changes depending on where it evolved. The materials on hand become a part of its body.
forms.name: Mega Wormadam

forms.description: Its appearance changes depending on where it evolved. The materials on hand become a part of its body.
forms.name: Mega Wormadam

name: Wormadam

description: It loves the honey of flowers and steals honey collected by Combee.
name: Mothim

description: The trio is together from birth. It constantly gathers honey from flowers to please Vespiquen.
name: Combee

description: It makes fur balls that crackle with static electricity. It stores them with berries in tree holes.
name: Pachirisu

description: It swims by rotating its two tails like a screw. When it dives, its flotation sac collapses.
name: Buizel

description: It houses its colony in cells in its body and releases various pheromones to make those grubs do its bidding.
name: Vespiquen

description: Sunlight colors it red. When the small ball is drained of nutrients, it shrivels to herald evolution.
name: Cherubi

description: During times of strong sunlight, its bud blooms, its petals open fully, and it becomes very active.

forms.description: During times of strong sunlight, its bud blooms, its petals open fully, and it becomes very active.
forms.name: Mega Cherrim

name: Cherrim

description: Beware of pushing strongly on its squishy body, as it makes a mysterious purple fluid ooze out.

forms.description: Beware of pushing strongly on its squishy body, as it makes a mysterious purple fluid ooze out.
forms.name: Mega Shellos

name: Shellos

description: It floats using its well-developed flotation sac. It assists in the rescues of drowning people.
name: Floatzel

description: When its natural enemy attacks, it oozes purple fluid and escapes.

forms.description: When its natural enemy attacks, it oozes purple fluid and escapes.
forms.name: Mega Gastrodon

name: Gastrodon

description: A Pokémon formed by the spirits of people and Pokémon. It loves damp, humid seasons.
name: Drifloon

description: They work in large colonies and make rings by linking their tails, apparently in friendship.
name: Ambipom

description: Its ears are always rolled up. They can be forcefully extended to shatter even a large boulder.
name: Buneary

description: Extremely cautious, it quickly bounds off when it senses danger.

forms.description: Extremely cautious, it quickly bounds off when it senses danger.
forms.name: Mega Lopunny

name: Lopunny

description: It carries people and Pokémon when it flies. But since it only drifts, it can end up anywhere.
name: Drifblim

description: It chants incantations. While they usually torment targets, some chants bring happiness.
name: Mismagius

description: If one utters a deep cry, many Murkrow gather quickly. For this, it is called "Summoner of Night."
name: Honchkrow

description: It claws if displeased and purrs when affectionate. Its fickleness is very popular among some.
name: Glameow

description: Each time it hops, it makes a ringing sound. It deafens foes by emitting high-frequency cries.
name: Chingling

description: It sprays a foul fluid from its rear. Its stench spreads over a mile radius, driving Pokémon away.
name: Stunky

description: It sprays a vile-smelling fluid from the tip of its tail to attack. Its range is over 160 feet.
name: Skuntank

description: It would claim another Pokémon's nest as its own if it finds a nest sufficiently comfortable.
name: Purugly

description: Ancient people believed that the pattern on Bronzor's back contained a mysterious power.
name: Bronzor

description: In ages past, this Pokémon was revered as a bringer of rain. It was found buried in the ground.
name: Bronzong

description: It prefers arid environments. It leaks water from its eyes to adjust its body's fluid levels.
name: Bonsly

description: In an attempt to confuse its enemy, it mimics the enemy's movements. Then it wastes no time in making itself scarce!
name: Mime Jr.

description: It carries a round, egg-shaped rock in its belly pouch and gives the rock to its friends.
name: Happiny

description: It mimics the cries of other Pokémon to trick them into thinking it's one of them. This way they won't attack it.
name: Chatot

description: A Pokémon that was formed by 108 spirits. It is bound to a fissure in an odd keystone.
name: Spiritomb

description: It loves sparkly things. It seeks treasures in caves and hoards the loot in its nest.
name: Gabite

description: When it folds up its body and extends its wings, it looks like a jet plane. It flies at sonic speed.

forms.description: When it folds up its body and extends its wings, it looks like a jet plane. It flies at sonic speed.
forms.name: Mega Garchomp

name: Garchomp

description: It hides food under its long body hair. However, it forgets it has hidden the food.
name: Munchlax

description: By catching the aura emanating from others, it can read their thoughts and movements.

forms.description: By catching the aura emanating from others, it can read their thoughts and movements.
forms.name: Mega Lucario

name: Lucario

description: It uses the shapes of auras, which change according to emotion, to communicate with others.
name: Riolu

description: It nests in horizontal holes warmed by geothermal heat. Foes who get too close can expect to be pounced on and bitten.
name: Gible

description: It lives in arid places. Instead of perspiration, it expels grainy sand from its body.
name: Hippopotas

description: It brandishes its gaping mouth in a display of fearsome strength. It raises vast quantities of sand while attacking.
name: Hippowdon

description: It grips prey with its tail claws and injects poison. It tenaciously hangs on until the poison takes.
name: Skorupi

description: It takes pride in its strength. Even though it can tear foes apart, it finishes them off with powerful poison.
name: Drapion

description: Its cheeks hold poison sacs. It tries to catch foes off guard to jab them with toxic fingers.
name: Croagunk

description: It has a poison sac at its throat. When it croaks, the stored poison is churned for greater potency.
name: Toxicroak

description: It attracts prey with its sweet-smelling saliva, then chomps down. It takes a whole day to eat prey.
name: Carnivine

description: The line running down its side can store sunlight. It shines vividly at night.
name: Finneon

description: It lives on the deep-sea floor. It attracts prey by flashing the patterns on its four tail fins.
name: Lumineon

description: During cold seasons, it migrates to the mountain's lower reaches. It returns to the snow-covered summit in the spring.
name: Snover

description: The pattern on its back varies by region. It often swims in a school of Remoraid.
name: Mantyke

description: It blankets wide areas in snow by whipping up blizzards. It is also known as "The Ice Monster."

forms.description: It blankets wide areas in snow by whipping up blizzards. It is also known as "The Ice Monster."
forms.name: Mega Abomasnow

name: Abomasnow

description: It lives in snowy regions. It carves patterns in trees with its claws as a signal to others.
name: Weavile

description: Sometimes the magnetism emitted by Magnezone is too strong, making them attract each other so they cannot move.
name: Magnezone

description: It wraps things with its extensible tongue. Getting too close to it will leave you soaked with drool.
name: Lickilicky

description: From holes in its palms, it fires out Geodude. Its carapace can withstand volcanic eruptions.
name: Rhyperior

description: It ensnares prey by extending arms made of vines. Losing arms to predators does not trouble it.
name: Tangrowth

description: As its electric charge amplifies, blue sparks begin to crackle between its horns.
name: Electivire

description: As everyone knows, it visits peaceful regions, bringing them gifts of kindness and sweet blessings.
name: Togekiss

description: It blasts fireballs of over 3,600 degrees Fahrenheit from the ends of its arms. It lives in volcanic craters.
name: Magmortar

description: It prefers to battle by biting apart foes' heads instantly while flying by at high speed.
name: Yanmega

description: When you see Leafeon asleep in a patch of sunshine, you'll know it is using photosynthesis to produce clean air.
name: Leafeon

description: By controlling its body heat, it can freeze the atmosphere around it to make a diamond-dust flurry.
name: Glaceon

description: A frozen Mamoswine was dug from ice dating back 10,000 years. This Pokémon has been around a long, long, long time.
name: Mamoswine

description: It observes prey while hanging inverted from branches. When the chance presents itself, it swoops!
name: Gliscor

description: Additional software was installed to make it a better Pokémon. It began acting oddly, however.
name: Porygon-Z

description: It exudes strong magnetism from all over. It controls three small units called Mini-Noses.
name: Probopass

description: Because it can sense what its foe is thinking, its attacks burst out first, fast, and fierce.

forms.description: Because it can sense what its foe is thinking, its attacks burst out first, fast, and fierce.
forms.name: Mega Gallade

name: Gallade

description: It is said to take lost spirits into its pliant body and guide them home.
name: Dusknoir

description: It freezes foes with an icy breath nearly -60 degrees Fahrenheit. What seems to be its body is actually hollow.
name: Froslass

description: Research continues on this Pokémon, which could be the power source of a unique motor.

forms.description: Research continues on this Pokémon, which could be the power source of a unique motor.
forms.name: Mega Rotom

forms.description: Research continues on this Pokémon, which could be the power source of a unique motor.
forms.name: Mega Rotom

forms.description: Research continues on this Pokémon, which could be the power source of a unique motor.
forms.name: Mega Rotom

forms.name: Mega Rotom

forms.description: Research continues on this Pokémon, which could be the power source of a unique motor.
forms.name: Mega Rotom

name: Rotom

description: Known as "The Being of Knowledge." It is said that it can wipe out the memory of those who see its eyes.
name: Uxie

description: Known as "The Being of Emotion." It taught humans the nobility of sorrow, pain, and joy.
name: Mesprit

description: Known as "The Being of Willpower." It sleeps at the bottom of a lake to keep the world in balance.
name: Azelf

description: A Pokémon spoken of in legend. It is said that time began moving when Dialga was born.
name: Dialga

description: It is said to live in a gap in the spatial dimension parallel to ours. It appears in mythology.
name: Palkia

description: It dwells in volcanic caves. It digs in with its cross-shaped feet to crawl on ceilings and walls.
name: Heatran

description: This Pokémon is said to live in a world on the reverse side of ours, where common knowledge is distorted and strange.

forms.description: This Pokémon is said to live in a world on the reverse side of ours, where common knowledge is distorted and strange.
forms.name: Mega Giratina

name: Giratina

description: When the water warms, they inflate the flotation sac on their heads and drift languidly on the sea in packs.
name: Phione

description: It is said to have made Pokémon that look like itself from a special ice mountain, rocks, and magma.
name: Regigigas

description: It is born with a wondrous power that lets it bond with any kind of Pokémon.
name: Manaphy

description: Shiny particles are released from its wings like a veil. It is said to represent the crescent moon.
name: Cresselia

description: It chases people and Pokémon from its territory by causing them to experience deep, nightmarish slumbers.
name: Darkrai

description: It can dissolve toxins in the air to instantly transform ruined land into a lush field of flowers.

forms.description: It can dissolve toxins in the air to instantly transform ruined land into a lush field of flowers.
forms.name: Mega Shaymin

name: Shaymin

description: According to the legends of Sinnoh, this Pokémon emerged from an egg and shaped all there is in this world.

forms.description: According to the legends of Sinnoh, this Pokémon emerged from an egg and shaped all there is in this world.
